name: Baby List, Inc.
description: Developer of a vertical marketplace and commerce destination designed for babies and driving purchase decisions. The company platform utilizes robust proprietary data, patented technology, and unbiased editorial guidance, it recommends expert-tested products to those starting their parenting journey, and registries connect new parents and a community of family and friends who help plan, prepare, and shop for a child's arrival, enabling client with smooth purchasing experience for parents.
